title: Effective Java Software Design
keywords: clean code training, java best practices, java clean code, java training, java conference, java conference, clean code rules, writing clean code
metaDescription: Training on building modern, clean and maintainable enterprise applications using up to date Java architecture techniques, frameworks and secret gems.
description: In this hands-on workshop you will learn how to build modern, clean and maintainable enterprise applications using up to date Java techniques, frameworks, and secret gems. The course is designed for experienced Java professionals who want to expand their knowledge beyond trivial and easy-to-google concepts. You will be equipped with effective practical solutions to real-world architecture and design challenges.
audience: Java developers, architects and team leaders willing to significantly improve their Java skills, productivity and career opportunities.
certification: You earn a Certificate of Accomplishment after completing an exam. Use it to boost your CV and LinkedIn profile.
language: The course runs in a diverse international group and is taught in English.
